name: privacymagic
description: a browser extension that protects your privacy online

scripts.build: npm run copy && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c && web-ext build --source-dir dist --overwrite-dest --artifacts-dir artifacts
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run copy:watch" "NODE_ENV=development rollup -c --watch" "web-ext run -t chromium --source-dir dist --ignore-files _metadata _metadata/**"

author: Arthur Edelstein
